title: [Grawood Farmstead, Field]
description: Fireflies dart here and there beneath the branches of a well-pruned apple tree, and the a tawny tan and white cow standing beneath the limbs seems not to notice.  Darkness obscures the animal's face, but it snorts from time to time, like an old man that dreams during sleep.
room.location: Grawood Farmstead outside of River's Rest
